body_html:
To help understand this better, here is what Cuda accessor is derived from, you can see a lot of similarities :
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THC/THCDeviceTensor.cuh

So in a sense, THCDeviceTensor is to THCTensor what CudaAccessor is to Accessor.

I am no expert in CUDA/CPU c++ templating, but I guess the reason why we need a cuda accessor in Aten in addition to regular accessor are the same as why we need a THCDeviceTensor.
